snippet.title: Great Houses of Calderia - First Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Next Fest: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1812910/view/3355757885620829628
Wishlist Great Houses of Calderia on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812910/Great_Houses_of_Calderia/?utm_campaign=gameplaytrailer

Great Houses of Calderia is a single-player Grand Strategy game set in the fantastic land of Calderia inspired by the Renaissance. Focusing on unique choices and real-time resources management, run an entire House and interact with your family to successfully form diplomatic relations with neighboring Houses.

Set to hit Steam Early Access end 2022, Great Houses of Calderia is Crusader Kings III meets Game of Thrones. Build your legacy through generations!

Great Houses of Calderia:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812910/Great_Houses_of_Calderia/?utm_campaign=gameplaytrailer
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GreatHousesOfCalderia
Twitter - https://twitter.com/CalderiaGame
Official website - https://calderiagames.com

Firesquid:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/FiresquidGames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/FiresquidGames
Official website - https://www.firesquid.fr

Resistance Games:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/resistancegames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/GamesResistance
Official website - https://resistancegames.com

--------------------------------------------

Music:
Great Houses of Calderia Theme
Janne Kariniemi & Seppo Kantonen

Voice actor & Voice actress:
Jono Oldham
https://jonooldham.wixsite.com/jonathanoldham
Federica Ferro
https://www.imdb.com/name/nm8712442

Trailer:
Suzanne Wallace
https://www.suzannewallacetrailers.com
